## getPropertyValue() function

Get the value of the specified property in given `env`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getPropertyValue(property: Value | undefined, env: Env, cache?: Map<Expr, Value>): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  property | [Value](./harp-datasource-protocol.value.md) \| undefined | Property of a technique. |
|  env | [Env](./harp-datasource-protocol.env.md) | The \[\[Env\]\] used to evaluate the property |
|  cache | Map&lt;[Expr](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.md)<!-- -->, [Value](./harp-datasource-protocol.value.md)<!-- -->&gt; | An optional expression cache. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
